short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Captures posts you've scrolled past on X (formerly Twitter)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
X Rewind: Never Lose a Post Again

Have you ever scrolled past an interesting post on X (formerly Twitter), only to lose it in the endless stream of content? X Rewind is here to solve that problem!

Key Features:
- Automatically captures posts as you scroll through your X feed
- Stores up to 100 recent posts for easy access
- Clean, intuitive interface to browse your post history
- Click any stored post to open it directly on X
- See how long ago each post was viewed
- Dark mode design for comfortable viewing

How It Works:
As you browse X, X Rewind quietly works in the background, saving posts you've scrolled past. When you want to find a post you've seen, simply open the X Rewind popup. You'll see a list of recent posts, each showing the username, a preview of the post content, and how long ago you viewed it.

Perfect for:
- Researchers tracking social media trends
- Journalists following breaking news
- Social media enthusiasts who don't want to miss important updates
- Anyone who's ever thought, "I just saw something interesting, where did it go?"

X Rewind respects your privacy. It only stores the posts you've actually scrolled past, and all data is kept locally in your browser. We don't collect or transmit any of your personal information.

Rediscover the posts you almost missed with X Rewind â€“ Your personal time machine for X!

Note: This extension is not affiliated with X Corp. or Twitter, Inc.
